tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Earned a sponsor's exemption into the RBC Canadian Open at Royal Montreal GC to make his PGA TOUR debut where he missed the cut with rounds of 75-73.

2014: After two amateur starts on PGA TOUR Canada, turned professional at The Great Waterway Classic and finished T5, thanks to three rounds in the 60s. Finished four shots behind champion David Bradshaw's 267 total...One week later, followed up with second top-10 finish (T7) at the Wildfire Invitational, moving inside the top 60 on the Order of Merit.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2014 Ontario Amateur Championship, shooting a final-round 63 to edge fellow Golf Canada National Amateur team members Corey Conners and Taylor Pendrith by a shot...Finished T35 at the 2014 Staal Foundation Open...Won back-to-back OUA Championships as an individual at the University of Guelph...Finished second at the 2012 Canadian Amateur Championship.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T5th in 2014 at the The Great Waterway Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 88th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
